mapper.insert: insert into MGV_BOOKING (BOOKING_NO,BOOKING_DATE, USER_ID,USER_NAME,MOVIE_NO,MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_POSTER,MOVIE_CONTENT_RATING,MOVIE_CONTENT_RATING_KR,START_TIME,END_TIME, SCHEDULE_ID,SCREEN_ID,SCREEN_NAME,THEATER_NO,THEATER_NAME,TOTAL_SEATS,BOOKED_SEATS_NOS,ADULT_SEATS,UNDERAGE_SEATS, GIFT_AMOUNT,PAY_AMOUNT,TOTAL_PRICE,PAY_METHOD # ,CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_DATE, BOOKING_STATE ) VALUES ( #{no}, #{bookingDate},#{userId},#{userName},#{movieNo},#{title},#{poster},#{contentRating},#{contentRatingKr},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{scheduleId},#{screenId},#{screenName}, #{theaterNo},#{theaterName},#{totalSeats},#{bookedSeatsNos},#{adultSeats},#{underageSeats},#{giftAmount},#{payAmount},#{totalPrice},#{payMethod} )
